constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 23 (Monday, February 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. McBATH:
H.R. 943.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
1. To lay and collect taxes, duties, imposts and excises,
to pay the debts and provide for the common defense and
general welfare of the United States; but all duties, imposts
and excises shall be uniform throughout the United States
[Page H484]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition, Oversight, and Department Operations.

title: Social Determinants for Moms Act
